title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1204.3 - Hours of travel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1204.3 - Hours of travel

State Regulations

If permission is granted for passage of a restricted
vehicle, it will generally be confined to the following periods: (a) George Washington Bridge. Monday-Friday: 10 a.m.-3 p.m.--7 p.m.-6 a.m. Saturday, Sunday: Traffic permitting
(b) Lincoln Tunnel. Daily--2 a.m.-5
a.m. (c) Holland Tunnel. Daily--2
a.m.-5 a.m. (d) Bayonne Bridge, Outerbridge Crossing. Daily--Traffic permitting
(e) Goethals Bridge. Monday-Friday: 9 a.m.-3
p.m.--7 p.m.-6 a.m. Saturday, Sunday: Traffic
permitting

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1204.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
